source.name: temperature
source.instructions: **What is the effect of increasing the temperature parameter in the image generation process?**

answers.answer: Produces more conservative and focused results
Increases the speed of image generation
Results in more diverse and potentially more creative prompts
Decreases the quality of generated images

source.guidance: The temperature parameter influences the randomness of the image generation process. A higher temperature value leads to more diverse and potentially more creative prompts, while a lower temperature value produces more conservative and focused results.
